# Demo of Data Analytics setup

First, as always we import data.

```{python}
import pandas as pd

data = pd.read_csv('demodata.csv')

```

Let's make a plot. Using  plotnine in python and save it in plots folder


```{python}
import plotnine as p

p1 = p.ggplot(data, p.aes(x='date', y='value')) + p.geom_point()
p1
```

Let's now save it. 


```{python}
p1.save('plots/plot1.png')
```
